content: All segments of our portfolio grew this quarter, led by over 40% growth in our leading core brand Carling Black Label, driven by BEES, our route-to-market is now digitized with almost 90% of our revenues coming through digital channels. This quarter our above core portfolio delivered over 15% revenue growth, led by Michelob ULTRA, which is now available in 14 markets and grew by double-digits. The combined revenues of Budweiser, Stella Artois and Corona grew by 6% outside of the brand's home markets, led by Corona with 14.1% and Stella Artois with 11.5% growth. Our global Beyond Beer business contributed over $350 million in revenues this quarter, led by the U.S. where Cutwater grew by strong double-digits and in South Africa where Brutal Fruit and Flying Fish delivered continued double-digit growth. As of the first quarter, we have seen increased adoption and exponential growth, as 31% of BEES customers are now users of BEES marketplace with annualized revenues of US$800 million.
